body.directions: Listen to the audio, and then complete the multiple-choice questions that follow.

body.quiz: What will you most reasonably find at the site indicated by the word in the audio?
body.correct: Wonderfully done! 图书馆 túshūguǎn means “library” where you can most reasonably and easily find many 书 shū (books).
body.incorrect: Not quite. Listen to the audio again to identify what site it indicates, and then imagine what you can most likely see at the site to make the most sense.

body.quiz: Which of the following words has the same initial as the first character in the word in the audio?
body.correct: Fabulous work! The first character, 博 bó, in the word 博物馆 bówùguǎn (museum) has the initial “b,” which is also the initial for the second character, 步 bù, in the word 跑步 pǎobù (to run).
body.incorrect: So close! Listen again and identify the initial of the first character in the word. Then sound out the pinyin of the words in the choices to see which one has the same initial.

body.quiz: What do the last two characters mean in the word in the audio?
body.correct: Totally fantastic! 市中心 shìzhōngxīn means “downtown,” namely “city center,” and the last two characters, 中心 zhōngxīn, mean “center.”
body.incorrect: Not quite. Listen to the audio several times to identify its meaning, and then consider how the word can be broken down and what each part means. You can refer to the notes under the vocabulary tiles for more information.

body.textVersion: Audio for 广场 guǎngchǎng (town square; plaza)

body.quiz: Which of the following sentences can be best completed by the word in the audio?
body.correct: How awesome! 广场 guǎngchǎng means “town square; plaza,” and it can best complete the sentence 她在广场拍照。 Tā zài guǎngchǎng pāizhào. (She’s taking pictures at the plaza.) You may not want to go swimming at a plaza.
body.incorrect: Oops…Listen to the audio several more times to identify its meaning. Then fit it in the four sentences in the choices to see which one makes the most sense.

body.quiz: Which of the following activities most likely takes place at the site indicated by the word in the audio?
body.correct: Outstanding job! 剧院 jùyuàn means “theater,” and you can most likely view a classic Shakespeare play there instead of a college football game.
body.incorrect: Oops…Listen to the audio several more times to identify its meaning. Then consider which of the four activities in the choices can most reasonably take place at the site indicated by the word.
